creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: bib and waist band totally embroidered in abstract floral on green and orange respectively; skirt part shirred turqouise with black pleats; skirt bound on sides with geometric embroidered tape; double neck loop; no ties; bib lined in batik print
title: Apron
